## Decision Criteria

### Success Scenario

**If the prototype succeeds** (meets success criteria):
- [ ] Proceed to full implementation
- [ ] Create implementation roadmap
- [ ] Assign to milestone
- [ ] Allocate resources

### Partial Success Scenario

**If the prototype partially succeeds**:
- [ ] Iterate on prototype
- [ ] Pivot to address gaps
- [ ] Re-test with updated version
- [ ] Make refinement vs. abort decision

### Failure Scenario

**If the prototype fails**:
- [ ] Document learnings
- [ ] Analyze why it failed
- [ ] Determine if pivot is possible
- [ ] If not, gracefully close idea
